content:
It is still early to determine the full impact of these initiatives on the town's environment and economy. However, some of the initiatives have reported positive outcomes.

For instance, the waste management program has resulted in cleaner streets, which has improved the overall appearance of the town. The beach nourishment program has increased the beach size, attracting more tourists and boosting the local economy. The promotion of eco-tourism has encouraged visitors to engage in sustainable practices, such as reducing their use of plastic, benefiting the environment.

Investments in renewable energy projects have impacted the environment by reducing reliance on fossil fuels, which can contribute to air pollution and climate change. Sustainable transportation initiatives have resulted in fewer cars on the roads, contributing to improved air quality.

In conclusion, while some initiatives' impact is still being evaluated, it is clear that the town is taking significant steps towards sustainability. These initiatives have reported positive outcomes in cleaner streets, increased tourism, and improved air quality. These early successes bode well for Durrës' long-term sustainability prospects.
